title: blood_analysis
text: blood lineage tracing dataset represented dataframe four columns. row dataset corresponds single cell, first second columns contain embedding information extracted scRNA-seq data. third column provides cell-related barcode derived lineage tracing data. Lastly, fourth column represents annotated cell type cell.
